text:
It's a well-known fact that first aid can save lives !
Firstly, first aid was invented during the war. In fact, any little action can improve the situation and save people. Everybody has to know what to do if someone, next to you, make a fit or a heart attack. Indeed, it's a very common situation. Imagine that you are in a train or in the street, somebody falls on the floor and don't answer to anybody, he has no reaction. The emergency service can't come quickly so the faster you act, the best you save lives. You start by checking if he still breathing in order to perform CPR in case his heart stopped. However, if he still breathing, you can put it in a recovery position. Thus, by simple action, you make anything you can to save his life. However, even if it doesn't work, you make anything you can and there is nothing to regret. Don't be afraid to make the situation worse, it can't be worse if the person is dead.
To finish, learning first aid is very important to know how to react to any situation to save people, it's barely nothing for you but change anything for people around you.
